model.dek: Kate Maxwell reports on the best hotels in London's East End including Shoreditch House, The Boundary, Town Hall Hotel, and Zetter Townhouse.
model.hed: The Best Hotels in London's East End

items.caption: There’s a retro sixties touch to the deep chairs at reception at **[Shoreditch House](http://www.shoreditchhouse.com/)**.

On a balmy summer evening, the rooftop bar at the **[Boundary Hotel](http://theboundary.co.uk/)** in Shoreditch is the place for a sundowner. Like many of the new hot spots, the Boundary was converted from a Victorian warehouse.

items.title: 3. Town Hall Hotel
items.caption: In Bethnal Green, the **[Town Hall Hotel](http://townhallhotel.com/home)** occupies a grand Edwardian building with marble and wood-paneled Art Deco interiors, a pool, and a gym. Studio-style bedrooms have kitchens, mid-century furniture, and glass-encased bathrooms (20-7871-0460; doubles from $250).

items.title: 4. Zetter Townhouse
items.caption: In Clerkenwell, a 15-minute bus ride from Shoreditch, the 13-room **[Zetter Townhouse](/hotels/europe/united-kingdom/the-zetter-townhouse-london-england)** is a quirky offshoot of the Zetter Hotel (20-7324-4444; doubles from $386).
